item.description:
Pack Monadnock is the second race of the Inov-8 USATFNE Mountain Circuit and offers a fun combination of rural road racing and mountain running. The course consists of rolling hills on dirt roads for 8 miles and a steep climb up Pack Monadnock Mountain for the remaining two. There's a fire tower up top with some great views of southern New Hampshire.

You can register and find more information at packmonadnockrace.com. I'll be driving there from Porter Square if anyone would like to carpool.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy wearing a blue argyle hat at registration.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Pack Monadnock 10 Miler
